abstract: Revolution is sexy. A contrarian developer is looking to buy properties in Atlantic City. A pioneer of hair products for black people dies at 82.
snippet: Revolution is sexy. A contrarian developer is looking to buy properties in Atlantic City. A pioneer of hair products for black people dies at 82.
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Why Amazon Must Be Stopped
